## Step 1: Submit your research questions 

1. Open the GitHub Organisation for the course <https://github.com/rbtl-fs25>

2. Open your repository project-USERNAME.

3. Open the issue tracker.

4. Create a new issue with the title: "Defined research questions for capstone project".

5. In the body of the issue, list your research questions.

6. Tag the course instructor `@elizabeth-tilley` and ask for a review of your research questions.
